abstracted_objective: Start a sequential code flow, with multiple subtasks performed in turn

Apply one or more defined operations or sequences of operations to input entities to produce outputs, including specifying necessary conditions, and analyze these transformations to understand their effects and mappings.
Derive, aggregate, and resolve quantitative or sequential outputs by applying defined computational procedures, transformations, and iterative operations to input data or intermediate values.
Evaluate collections of elements against specified criteria or constraints, select or quantify those that satisfy conditions, and identify extremal or optimal values as needed.
Assess the effect of specified changes or transformations on elements or outcomes by determining resulting states, measuring differences from references, and evaluating significance or influence.
End of current sequential code flow
